name: Covalense
tagline: IT Services in both MSFT & Open Source
description:
Covalense Technologies, a smart software development and services company recognized for its high value business software solutions, provides software services in areas of
Application Development Services and Solutions,
Application Management Outsourcing,
QA & Testing
Consulting Design and Architecture Services
Managed Software Services
Enterprise Applications, Cloud, BI, RPA, Mobile, E-Commerce and ERP
Covalense delivery model offers a mix of onsite and offshore engagements with Scale-up/down resourcing model, low-cost offerings and high ROI on investments in Software tools and technologies 
Established & founded in INDIA, the major outsourcing destination, Covalense is a reliable partner for its customers across Australia, New Zealand, USA, Singapore, ME and UK.
It has state-of-the-art Development Centres located at Hyderabad & Bangalore, India and mini development centers at Australia and New Zealand. Further, it has Sales offices and operations in Singapore and USA.
Covalense, a Microsoft Gold Certirifed company offers its services across Microsoft, Oracle, Open Source (PHP, JAVA, Ruby-on-Rails, Python and others), IBM, Google, Amazon (AWS), Saleforce and other popular OTC platforms
Microsoft technologies being its forte, Covalense recently implemented award-winning technoligy mirgration of an enterprise legacy product into Microsoft Dynamics Stack (CRM, NAV and Azure) in Australia and New Zealand Market.
We are reputed in the market for having long-term customers and few of our major customers completed 5 - 8 years term with Covalense
Covalense Technologies, offers its services across regions and Small to Medium to large enterprises including fortune 1000 companies.
